entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries or snow squalls. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries and local snow squalls. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Local amount 3 cm north of Cape Ray. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 in the Wreckhouse area late in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 09 February 2023
